concept.title: Bidirectional overview
concept.shortdesc: Publish this topic to check the publishing behavior for inline and block elements containing left-to-right languages.

conbody.p: This is an example text that, within the context of an right-to-left topic, includes some fragments in left-to-right language.
This can happen in a block element or in an inline element.

ul.li: Inline element: إن شاء الله in the flow of the text in English.

conbody.p: The processor SHOULD provide the proper direction for the text when publishing.
